channel.title: CVE Feed for ManageEngine -- Desktop Central
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ManageEngine -- Desktop Central

item.title: CVE-2023-4768|2024-08-02T07:37:59.679Z -- manageengine -- desktop%20central
item.description: A CRLF injection vulnerability has been found in ManageEngine Desktop Central affecting version 9.1.0. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to inject arbitrary HTTP headers and perform HTTP response splitting attacks via the fileName parameter in /STATE_ID/1613157927228/InvSWMetering.pdf.

item.title: CVE-2023-4767|2024-08-02T07:37:59.867Z -- manageengine -- desktop%20central
item.description: A CRLF injection vulnerability has been found in ManageEngine Desktop Central affecting version 9.1.0. This vulnerability could allow a remote attacker to inject arbitrary HTTP headers and perform HTTP response splitting attacks via the fileName parameter in /STATE_ID/1613157927228/InvSWMetering.csv.

item.title: CVE-2023-4769|2024-08-02T07:38:00.511Z -- manageengine -- desktop%20central
item.description: A SSRF vulnerability has been found in ManageEngine Desktop Central affecting version 9.1.0, specifically the /smtpConfig.do component. This vulnerability could allow an authenticated attacker to launch targeted attacks, such as a cross-port attack, service enumeration and other attacks via HTTP requests.
